Mục lục trang

xView1 Dataset - Image Sources & Documentation ​

Comprehensive collection of imagery for xView dataset documentation, with source URLs, descriptions, and local file mappings.

Paper Figures (ArXiv 1802.07856) ​

Figure 1: Sample Satellite Imagery ​

  • URL: https://ar5iv.labs.arxiv.org/html/1802.07856/assets/output.png
  • Local File: dataset/fig1-sample-imagery.png
  • Description: Four views of xView satellite imagery from different geographic locations, demonstrating the diversity of geographic coverage and object types in the dataset
  • Use Case: Introduction/overview, dataset characteristics
  • Attribution: xView Paper (Lam et al., WACV 2018)
  • License: Academic use (paper figures)
  • Dimensions: 1016x1016 px
  • File Size: 590 KB
  • Type: PNG (8-bit colormap)

Figure 2: Dataset Comparison (COWC, PASCAL VOC, xView) ​

  • URL: https://ar5iv.labs.arxiv.org/html/1802.07856/assets/xview_voc_cowc_1.png
  • Local File: dataset/fig2-cowc-voc-comparison.png
  • Description: Side-by-side comparison of car detection examples from COWC (Cars Overhead With Context), PASCAL VOC, and xView datasets, highlighting resolution and annotation differences
  • Use Case: Dataset comparison, scale differences demonstration
  • Attribution: xView Paper (Lam et al., WACV 2018)
  • License: Academic use (paper figures)
  • Dimensions: 3001x1667 px
  • File Size: 865 KB
  • Type: PNG (8-bit colormap)
  • Note: High resolution comparison chart

Figure 3: QGIS Annotation Interface ​

  • URL: https://ar5iv.labs.arxiv.org/html/1802.07856/assets/QGIS.png
  • Local File: dataset/fig3-qgis-annotation.png
  • Description: QGIS (Quantum GIS) annotation software interface showing red bounding box annotations on satellite imagery. Demonstrates the annotation workflow and methodology used for creating xView labels
  • Use Case: Annotation methodology, tools overview
  • Attribution: xView Paper (Lam et al., WACV 2018)
  • License: Academic use (paper figures)
  • Dimensions: 1040x1040 px
  • File Size: 431 KB
  • Type: PNG (8-bit colormap)

Figure 4a: Class Distribution (Instances per Category) ​

  • URL: https://ar5iv.labs.arxiv.org/html/1802.07856/assets/instances_per_category_small.png
  • Local File: dataset/fig4a-class-distribution.png
  • Description: Bar chart showing the distribution of instances across all 60 object classes in the xView dataset. Demonstrates class balance and frequency
  • Use Case: Dataset statistics, class distribution analysis
  • Attribution: xView Paper (Lam et al., WACV 2018)
  • License: Academic use (paper figures)
  • Dimensions: 1404x344 px
  • File Size: 153 KB
  • Type: PNG (8-bit RGBA)

Figure 4b: Pixel Area Distribution (Box-Whisker Plot) ​

  • URL: https://ar5iv.labs.arxiv.org/html/1802.07856/assets/box-whisker_small.png
  • Local File: dataset/fig4b-pixel-distribution.png
  • Description: Box-whisker plot showing pixel area distribution by object class, illustrating object size variation across categories
  • Use Case: Object scale analysis, annotation statistics
  • Attribution: xView Paper (Lam et al., WACV 2018)
  • License: Academic use (paper figures)
  • Dimensions: 325x400 px
  • File Size: 21 KB
  • Type: PNG (8-bit grayscale+alpha)

Figure 5: Class Comparison Graph ​

  • URL: https://ar5iv.labs.arxiv.org/html/1802.07856/assets/wacv_graph_3.png
  • Local File: dataset/fig5-class-comparison.png
  • Description: Multi-line graph comparing total instance count versus number of classes, showing relationship between dataset scale and category diversity
  • Use Case: Dataset scaling analysis
  • Attribution: xView Paper (Lam et al., WACV 2018)
  • License: Academic use (paper figures)
  • Dimensions: 1677x1042 px
  • File Size: 97 KB
  • Type: PNG (8-bit RGB)

Figure 6: Geographic Sample Diversity (Planes & Cars) ​

  • URL: https://ar5iv.labs.arxiv.org/html/1802.07856/assets/planes_cars_vertical.png
  • Local File: dataset/fig6-geographic-samples.png
  • Description: Extracted examples of cars and planes from four different geographic locations, demonstrating variation in appearance due to geography, lighting, and season
  • Use Case: Object appearance variance, geographic diversity
  • Attribution: xView Paper (Lam et al., WACV 2018)
  • License: Academic use (paper figures)
  • Dimensions: 516x1032 px
  • File Size: 170 KB
  • Type: PNG (8-bit colormap)

Figure 7: Quality Control Examples ​

  • URL: https://ar5iv.labs.arxiv.org/html/1802.07856/assets/QC.png
  • Local File: dataset/fig7-quality-control.png
  • Description: Quality control verification showing before and after annotations. Demonstrates annotation refinement process and the rigor of xView labeling
  • Use Case: Quality assurance methodology, annotation standards
  • Attribution: xView Paper (Lam et al., WACV 2018)
  • License: Academic use (paper figures)
  • Dimensions: 2271x931 px
  • File Size: 426 KB
  • Type: PNG (8-bit colormap)

Figure 8: Fully Annotated Image ​

  • URL: https://ar5iv.labs.arxiv.org/html/1802.07856/assets/appendix_labels.png
  • Local File: dataset/fig8-fully-annotated.png
  • Description: Complete annotated xView image showing multiple object class labels overlaid with bounding boxes, demonstrating the annotation format and multi-class annotation
  • Use Case: Annotation format example, multi-object detection demonstration
  • Attribution: xView Paper (Lam et al., WACV 2018)
  • License: Academic use (paper figures)
  • Dimensions: 873x813 px
  • File Size: 470 KB
  • Type: PNG (8-bit colormap)

Figure 9: Dataset Comparison (xView, COWC, SpaceNet) ​

  • URL: https://ar5iv.labs.arxiv.org/html/1802.07856/assets/datasets_mod.png
  • Local File: dataset/fig9-dataset-comparison.png
  • Description: Side-by-side chip comparisons across xView, COWC, and SpaceNet datasets, highlighting differences in resolution, annotation style, and data characteristics
  • Use Case: Competitive analysis, dataset differentiation
  • Attribution: xView Paper (Lam et al., WACV 2018)
  • License: Academic use (paper figures)
  • Dimensions: 1224x368 px
  • File Size: 799 KB
  • Type: PNG (8-bit RGB)

Figure 10: Geographic Coverage Map ​

  • URL: https://ar5iv.labs.arxiv.org/html/1802.07856/assets/map.png
  • Local File: dataset/fig10-geographic-map.png
  • Description: Map visualization showing geographic collection locations for xView, SpaceNet, and COWC datasets. Demonstrates xView's global coverage
  • Use Case: Geographic coverage, dataset scope demonstration
  • Attribution: xView Paper (Lam et al., WACV 2018)
  • License: Academic use (paper figures)
  • Dimensions: 858x422 px
  • File Size: 158 KB
  • Type: PNG (8-bit RGBA)

Figure 11: Class Examples (All 60 Classes) ​

  • URL: https://ar5iv.labs.arxiv.org/html/1802.07856/assets/xview_classes.png
  • Local File: dataset/fig11-class-examples.png
  • Description: Visual gallery showing sample image patches for each of the 60 object categories in xView. Essential reference for understanding object types covered
  • Use Case: Class reference, ontology visualization
  • Attribution: xView Paper (Lam et al., WACV 2018)
  • License: Academic use (paper figures)
  • Dimensions: 3976x3306 px
  • File Size: 1.1 MB
  • Type: PNG (8-bit colormap)
  • Note: Largest and most comprehensive figure; high resolution needed for readability

Dataset-Specific Visualizations (DatasetNinja) ​

Poster ​

  • URL: https://cdn.datasetninja.com/github/dataset-ninja/xview/main/visualizations/poster.png
  • Local File: dataset/poster.png
  • Description: xView dataset poster summarizing key statistics and characteristics including 1M object instances, 60 classes, 0.3m resolution, 1415 km² coverage
  • Use Case: Dataset summary, presentations, promotional materials
  • Attribution: DatasetNinja/Supervisely
  • License: Creative Commons or open use for dataset promotion
  • Dimensions: 1200x661 px
  • File Size: 1.0 MB
  • Type: PNG (8-bit RGB)
  • Content: Statistics badge, dataset highlights, use cases

Class Distribution Heatmaps ​

  • URL: https://cdn.datasetninja.com/github/dataset-ninja/xview/main/stats/classes_heatmaps.png
  • Local File: dataset/class-heatmaps.png
  • Description: Heatmap visualization showing spatial and frequency distribution of all 60 object classes. Provides statistical overview of class balance and frequency
  • Use Case: Class statistics, dataset composition analysis
  • Attribution: DatasetNinja/Supervisely
  • License: Creative Commons or open use for dataset analysis
  • Dimensions: 1200x1766 px
  • File Size: 1.9 MB
  • Type: PNG (8-bit RGB)
  • Note: Most comprehensive class statistics visualization

Recommended Document Integration ​

For Introduction/Overview Sections ​

  • Use fig1-sample-imagery.png for opening imagery
  • Use poster.png for key statistics callout
  • Use fig10-geographic-map.png for coverage demonstration

For Methodology Sections ​

  • Use fig3-qgis-annotation.png for annotation workflow
  • Use fig7-quality-control.png for QA processes
  • Use fig8-fully-annotated.png for annotation format

For Statistical Analysis ​

  • Use fig4a-class-distribution.png for class distribution
  • Use fig4b-pixel-distribution.png for object size distribution
  • Use class-heatmaps.png for comprehensive statistics

For Comparison/Benchmarking ​

  • Use fig2-cowc-voc-comparison.png for resolution comparison
  • Use fig9-dataset-comparison.png for dataset feature comparison
  • Use fig11-class-examples.png for ontology reference

For Visual Variety ​

  • Use sample images (sample-image-1/2/3.tif) for visual breaks
  • Use fig6-geographic-samples.png for geographic diversity examples

License & Attribution ​

xView Paper Figures ​

  • Citation: Lam, D., Kuzma, R., McGee, W., Dooley, S., Laielli, M., Klaric, M., ... & Collins, R. (2018). xView: Objects in Context in Overhead Imagery. In Winter Conference on Applications of Computer Vision (WACV).
  • Paper URL: https://arxiv.org/abs/1802.07856
  • License: Academic/research use (check original paper for specific terms)
  • DOI: 10.1109/WACV.2018.00032

DatasetNinja Resources ​

  • Source: https://datasetninja.com/xview
  • Provider: Supervisely/DatasetNinja
  • License: Check DatasetNinja terms of service for preview images

xView Dataset ​

  • Official Site: https://xviewdataset.org/
  • Organizer: National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency (NGA), Defense Innovation Unit
  • License: Check xViewdataset.org for specific dataset licensing terms
  • Citation: Refer to paper citation above

Unresolved Questions ​

  1. Exact license terms for DatasetNinja preview images - verify if CC-licensed or proprietary
  2. Commercial use restrictions on xView paper figures - confirm if acceptable for commercial documentation
  3. Original resolution of xView imagery - figures show downsampled versions
  4. Copyright holder for all visualization graphics - confirm if NGA, DIU, or researchers
